org.onyxplatform.api.java.instance

Class NativeBindUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onyxplatform.api.java.instance.BindUtils
      • org.onyxplatform.api.java.instance.NativeBindUtils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NativeNames, org.onyxplatform.api.java.OnyxNames

    public class NativeBindUtils
extends org.onyxplatform.api.java.instance.BindUtils
implements org.onyxplatform.api.java.OnyxNames, NativeNames
    NativeBindUtils is a static utility class designed to work with User Classes which extend the OnyxFn abstract class which are backed by native libraries. This utility provides a method which can add an object instance that is derived from a user class to a job catalog. It also provides methods related to memory management of these catalog objects, allowing users to manually unload the instances when they are no longer used by the job.

    • Method Detail

      • addFn

        public static org.onyxplatform.api.java.Catalog addFn(org.onyxplatform.api.java.Catalog catalog,
                                                      java.lang.String taskName,
                                                      int batchSize,
                                                      int batchTimeout,
                                                      java.lang.String fqClassName,
                                                      clojure.lang.IPersistentMap ctrArgs,
                                                      java.lang.String libName,
                                                      clojure.lang.IPersistentMap initArgs)
        Creates and adds an object instance to an existing Catalog object. The object instance is derived from a user class which extends the NativeOnyxFn abstract class. To use this method, a name for the object must be provided, along with the fully qualified user base class, a map of arguments to use as constructor args for the class, the library name, initialization parameters, and the environment parameters batchSize and batchTimeout.
        Parameters:
        catalog - the catalog object to which the new object instance will be added as a task
        taskName - a string to use as a name for the object instance task in the Catalog
        batchSize - an integer describing the number of segments that will be read at a time
        batchTimeout - an integer describing the longest amount of time (ms) that a task will wait before reading segments
        fqClassName - a string naming the fully qualified user class to use in object instance creation
        ctrArgs - an IPersistentMap containing arguments to use in the user class constructor
        libName - a string naming the library to be loaded
        initArgs - an IPersistentMap containing arguments to use when initializing the native library
        Returns:
        returns the updated catalog which includes the added task
